ygData.subject: tricks of cheaters
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, here s some tricks I know for racking up lots of experience for clerics: put 2 clerics next to each other and let them be continously attacked. With luck

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

ok, here's some tricks I know for racking up lots of experience for 
clerics:

put 2 clerics next to each other and let them be continously attacked. 
 With luck (and enough magic power), they will continously heal 
themselves up and gain lots of experience.

In 'Lake Tracona' (a built-in scenario){ one of the teleporters is 
lined up against a wall, allowing your teammates to lose health.  Let 
the team nearly die and then use a cleric to rebuild the health.  
Repeat process until cleric is at desired experience level.

Before I used the registered version, I used to be able to use a druid 
 to grow a tree and have a thief blow it up to get experience points. 
 Why doesn't that trick work on the registered version?  Seriously, 
I've created bombs powerfull enough to wipe out opponents, but they 
have no effect on druid-planted trees.  WHy?

Any other tricks out there?
